pageContext.geocode_address: 6651 Southwest Capitol Highway, Portland, OR 97219, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: A Play-Well offering for girls who love to build! This course will provide a supportive environment for girls to build engineer-designed projects such as Boats, Snowmobiles, Catapults, and Merry-Go-Rounds. Then use special pieces to create your own unique design! New and returning students can explore the endless creative possibilities of the LEGO® building system with the guidance of an experienced Play-Well instructor. There is no prerequisite for this course.
pageContext.course_type_name: Girl Powered Intro to STEM with LEGO® Materials, Summer
